mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach (uuid, upload_path, file_name, file_type, owner_id, owner_type) values(#{uuid, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{ownerId}, #{ownerType})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_attach where owner_type = #{ownerType} and owner_id = #{ownerId} and uuid = #{uuid}
delete from tbl_attach where owner_type = #{ownerType} and owner_id = #{ownerId}
